entry.title: New release for wg-easy: v12.0.0
entry.content:
UI_TRAFFIC_STATS, Import json configurations with no PreShared-Key, allow clients with no privateKey & more.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/commits/v12.0.0

entry.title: New release for wg-easy: v13.0.0
entry.content:
New framework (h3), UI_CHART_TYPE, some bugfixes & more.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/compare/v12.0.0...v13.0.0

entry.title: New release for wg-easy: v15.0.0
entry.content:
UI, IPv6, CIDR, Docs, CLI & so much more.

We're super excited to announce v15! This update is an entire rewrite to make it even easier to set up your own VPN.

Breaking Changes

As the whole setup has changed, we recommend to start from scratch. And import your existing configs.

Major Changes

  • Almost all Environment variables removed
  • New and Improved UI
  • API Basic Authentication
  • Added Docs
  • Incrementing Version -> Semantic Versioning
  • CIDR Support
  • IPv6 Support
  • Changed API Structure
  • SQLite Database
  • Deprecated Dockerless Installations
  • Added Docker Volume Mount (/lib/modules)
  • Removed ARMv6 support
  • Connections over HTTP require setting the INSECURE env var
  • Changed license from CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 to AGPL-3.0-only
  • Added 2FA using TOTP
  • Improved mobile support
  • CLI
  • Replaced nightly with edge

See: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pkgs/container/wg-easy/425608529?tag=15

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/compare/v14.0.0...v15.0.0

entry.title: New release for wg-easy: v14.0.0
entry.content:
Home Assistent support, PASSWORD_HASH (inc. Helper), translation updates bugfixes & more.

Major changes

  • PASSWORD has been replaced by PASSWORD_HASH

Installation

See: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pkgs/container/wg-easy/429410685?tag=14

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/compare/v13.0.0...v14.0.0

entry.title: New release for wg-easy: v15.1.0
entry.content:
Added option to disable IPv6 and new languages

What's Changed

  • Added Ukrainian language by @Loudhot in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1906
  • Add French language by @3zmana in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1924
  • docs for caddy example by @whilenot-dev in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1939
  • Add german translations by @Cameo007 in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1889
  • feat: Add Traditional Chinese (zh-HK) i18n Support by @rayyamhk in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1988
  • Add Chinese Simplified by @yhl452493373 in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1990
  • Updated container launch commands by @kiruxaspb in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1989
  • Add option to disable ipv6 by @kaaax0815 in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1951
  • update screenshot by @kaaax0815 in 962bfa2
  • add docs on how to add/update translation by @kaaax0815 in be26db6

New Contributors

  • @3zmana made their first contribution in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1924
  • @whilenot-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1939
  • @Cameo007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1889
  • @rayyamhk made their first contribution in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1988
  • @kiruxaspb made their first contribution in https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pull/1989

Docs

See https://wg-easy.github.io/wg-easy/v15.1/advanced/config/optional-config/ on how to disable IPv6

Installation

See: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pkgs/container/wg-easy/450840263?tag=15

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/compare/v15.0.0...v15.1.0
